N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 2 ยง 119.1 - Background

State Regulations
WHEREAS, Section
1406
of
the Abandoned Property Law directs that the Comptroller, upon receipt of an
application within four months of the issuance of a written determination
denying a claim for the refund of abandoned property, shall hold a hearing to
review and redetermine such claim; and
WHEREAS, Section 301 of the State Administrative Procedure

Act mandates that agencies shall adopt rules governing the procedures on
adjudicatory proceedings and appeals; and
WHEREAS, Section
1414
of
the Abandoned Property Law authorizes the Comptroller to make such rules and
regulations as he may deem necessary to enforce the provisions of the Abandoned

Property Law, it is, therefore, hereby: Determined that the following regulations shall be
promulgated to determine the procedures which shall be observed and the rules
which shall be followed for the scheduling of and conduct of such
hearings. Notes
